data.message: Dude the song killed. He’s saying fuck you to the people that says he’s fallen off. That he’s changed. He has changed and for the better not as angry not in drugs. Good for you Em! He’s human he makes mistakes. People have been squandering him for years but they are butt hurt about him not being an addict anymore. Fuck all of them slim. Keel your head up keep rapping.  Love absolutely everything you’ve put out and say what you got to say. Political or not.
